rows.business_item_short_description: Cloud computing services offered by Google Cloud segment.
rows.business_item_long_description: The Google Cloud segment provides cloud computing services as part of its infrastructure offerings. These services are a key component of the segment's distinct business focus within Alphabet.
rows.evidence_span: Google Cloud segment includes cloud computing services and infrastructure offerings.

rows.business_item_short_description: Infrastructure offerings provided by Google Cloud segment.
rows.business_item_long_description: Google Cloud segment offers infrastructure offerings alongside cloud computing services. These offerings contribute to the segment's growth and distinct business focus within Alphabet.
rows.evidence_span: Google Cloud segment includes cloud computing services and infrastructure offerings.

rows.business_item: Google Search and other related services
rows.business_item_short_description: Consumer-facing search engine and related services.
rows.business_item_long_description: Google Search and other related services provide users with access to information through a powerful search engine and associated tools. These services form a core part of Google's consumer offerings.
rows.evidence_span: This includes Google Search and other related services

rows.business_item_long_description: Google Network advertising encompasses ads served across Google's network of partner sites and platforms, enabling advertisers to reach a broad audience beyond Google's own properties.

rows.business_item_short_description: Subscription services, platforms, and devices offered by Google.
rows.business_item_long_description: This includes various subscription-based services, platforms, and devices provided by Google, contributing to the consumer and advertiser-facing product portfolio within the Google Services segment.
